Uses of Class
activity.CommentPageActivity

  • Packages that use CommentPageActivity 
    Package Description
    network_io  

    • Uses of CommentPageActivity in network_io

      Methods in network_io with parameters of type CommentPageActivity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IoStreamHandler.checkEditSpecificComment(java.lang.String commentId, java.lang.String userName, CommentPageActivity activity)
      Check if the given userName is the same of the author of the comment with the given comment id, if it is, direct the user to the EditPage in the UI thread(CommentPageActivity).
      void IoStreamHandler.loadAndSetSpecificComment(java.lang.String commentId, TextView commentView, TextView authorInfo, ImageView pic, CommentMap cm, CommentPageActivity activity)
      Load a specific Comment by its own Id ; Set the content of this comment in to a TextView ;Set anthorInfo,time posted and location(if its not null) of this comment.
      void IoStreamHandler.loadSpecificComment(java.lang.String commentId, CommentMap cm, CommentPageActivity activity)
      Put a Comment in to the CommentMap with the specific id from the web server in the CommentPageActivity(sub level).
      void IoStreamHandler.loadSpecificCommentForCache(java.lang.String commentId, CacheController cc, CommentPageActivity activity)
      Load a comment specified by id as favorite and store the comment and all its replies in to the sharedpreferences.
      void IoStreamHandler.loadSpecificCommentForCacheReply(java.lang.String commentId, java.lang.String parentId, CacheController cc, CommentPageActivity activity)
      Load a comment for cache ,store it in the sharedpreferences with the key value equals to this comment's parent Id.
